speaker: Agent
text: Hello, this is Mark from XYZ Collections. How are you today?

speaker: Customer
text: What the hell do you want? I don't have time for this!

speaker: Agent
text: I understand you're busy. I'm calling regarding your account. Can you please verify your date of birth for security?

speaker: Customer
text: Are you kidding me? You people are freaking parasites! It's 15th of June, 1990!

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you for that information. I need to confirm your address to proceed with the account details.

speaker: Customer
text: My address? Why the hell do you need that? It's 123 Main St, and I'm done with this!

speaker: Agent
text: I appreciate your patience. I can see you have a balance of $500. How would you like to settle this?

speaker: Customer
text: Settle it? You must be out of your mind if you think I'm paying you a damn cent!

speaker: Agent
text: I understand your frustration. We can discuss payment options that might work for you.

speaker: Customer
text: Options? You mean your bullshit tactics! Just leave me alone!

speaker: Agent
text: It's my job to help you, and I'm here to listen. Would you prefer a payment plan?

speaker: Customer
text: I don't want your help! Just stop calling me!

speaker: Agent
text: I hear you. I will note your request. Thank you for your time, and have a good day.
